attributes.action: All schools should remain closed until the new school year begins in September.
attributes.additional_details:
The coronavirus epidemic in the UK is far from under control with approximately 4,000 new cases still being confirmed every single day.

Parents should not be put in a position where they face a choice between breaking the law or putting their family’s health at risk if schools reopen with all pupils required to attend.
attributes.background: Due to the continuing coronavirus epidemic the government should not require schools to reopen for all pupils until the new school year begins in September.
